column2: plot.pca.combat.sponge = Scatter_Density(data = pca.sponge.combat$variates$X,batch = sponge.batch, trt = sponge.trt, expl.var = pca.sponge.combat$explained_variance, xlim = c(-4.5,5), ylim = c(-3,4), batch.legend.title = 'Gel (batch)', trt.legend.title = 'Tissue (trt)', title = 'Batch correction with ComBat (Sponge)')
